pages.text: 19|96|Niscaya yisakale imana aniche arau satkarma karaiche rahamane arasye te'omlokara babe (bandasakalara hrdayata) bhalaporaa srsti karaiba.
19|97|Arau ami tomara bhasata kora'anaka sahaja karai dicho yate tumi iyara dbaraa muttakbisakalaka susambada diba paraa arau bitandapraiya sampradayaka iyara dbaraa satarka karaiba paraa.
19|98|Arau sihamtara purbe ami kimana ye prajanmaka binasa karaicho! Tumi sihamtara karaobara astitba anubhara karaichane athaba ksinatakaiyo ksina kono sabda sunibalai poraa ne
20|2|ami tomaka dukha-kastata patita karaibalai tomara prati e'i kora'ana aratirna karaa na'i
20|3|baram yiye bhaya karae tara babe upadesa sbaraupa (aratirna karaicho)
20|4|yijane prthirai arau su'ucca akasasamuha srsti karaiche te'omra taraphara paraa nayilakrta
20|6|Akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora majata yi ache lagate bhugarbhata yi ache se'i sakalo te'omrae'i.
20|7|Arau yadi tumi ucca kanthata katha koraa (yadi'o iyara kono prayojana na'i), tente (jani thoraa) te'om gopana arau ati gopana sakalo bisaye jane.
20|8|Allaha, te'omra bahirae ana kono satya ilaha na'i, sundara namasamuha kerala te'omrae'i.
20|9|Arau muchara brttanta tomara ocarata ahi pa'ichene

20|10|te'om yetiya ju'i dekha pale tetiya te'om nija paraiyalabargaka ka’le, ‘tomaloke apeksa karaa, niscaya ma'i ju'i dekha pa'icho. Asa karao ma'i tomalokara babe tara paraa alapa jbalanta enara aniba paraima na'iba ju'ira ocarata kono pathanirdesa paba parao’.
20|11|Yetiya te'om ju'ira ocara ahi pale tetiya te'omka ahbana karaa ha’la, ‘he mucha
20|12|‘niscaya maye'i tomara raba, eteke tomara jotayora khuli peloraa, karana tumi etiya paraitra toraa upatyakata acha.
